data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 239 believers in Piti, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Piti, Guam
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 239 believers in Piti to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,261 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, help 3 new simple churches start among the 1,500 people in the state of Piti, Guam. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Piti, Guam.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Piti Village
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Piti Village, Piti, Guam.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Piti, Guam a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 239 believers in the state of Piti to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.section_summary:
the state of Piti, Guam has a population of 1,500.

We estimate Piti has 239 people who might know Jesus, 1,149 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 112 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Piti, Guam and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.
